abstract.text: Perform element-wise operations on vectors of real values.

inlineContent.text: The vDSP library provides a suite of general-purpose, high-performance arithmetic functions that are alternatives to
when you apply operations on collections of floating-point values.
for a summary of available operations.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Perform elementwise operations on vectors of complex values.
Perform elementwise operations on vectors of integer values.
Calculate the element-wise linear average of two vectors.
Evaluate polynomials using coefficients and independent variables that you supply.
